languages.text: "У меня есть одна..." {n}Маражай запинается, подбирая выражение.{/n} "Одно пожелание. Прежде, чем мы покинем шпиль, я хочу забрать кое что. Кое-что... памятное, оставленное мной в обители кабала. Я бы не хотел, чтобы оно попало в чужие руки, когда после нас в шпиль устремятся стервятники и мародеры. Возможно, кое-что перепадет и тебе..." {n}Маражай заставляет последнюю фразу повиснуть в воздухе.{/n}

"I have a..." {n}Marazhai stops, searching for the right word.{/n} "A desire. Before we leave the spire, there is something I want to pick up. Something... memorable. I left it in the Kabal's abode. I do not want it to fall into the hands of others when carrion eaters and looters flood the spire after we are gone. There could be something in it for you..." {n}He lets the last words hang in the air.{/n}

Кое-что... памятное, оставленное мной в обители кабала. Я бы не хотел, чтобы оно попало в чужие руки, когда после нас в шпиль устремятся стервятники и мародеры. Возможно, кое-что перепадет и тебе..." {n}Маражай заставляет последнюю фразу повиснуть в воздухе.{/n}

languages.text: « J'ai un... » {n}Marazhai s'interrompt, à la recherche de la bonne formulation.{/n} « Un désir à formuler. Avant de quitter la tour, il y a quelque chose que j'aimerais récupérer. Un... souvenir. Je l'ai laissé dans les quartiers de la Kabale. Je ne veux pas qu'il tombe entre les mains de quelqu'un d'autre lorsque les charognards ne manqueront pas d'envahir la tour après notre départ. Vous pourriez même y gagner quelque chose... » {n}Il laisse ces derniers mots en suspens.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I have a..." {n}Marazhai stops, searching for the right word.{/n} "A desire. Before we leave the spire, there is something I want to pick up. Something... memorable. I left it in the Kabal's abode. I do not want it to fall into the hands of others when carrion eaters and looters flood the spire after we are gone. There could be something in it for you..." {n}He lets the last words hang in the air.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « J'ai un... » {n}Marazhai s'interrompt, à la recherche de la bonne formulation.{/n} « Un désir à formuler. Avant de quitter la tour, il y a quelque chose que j'aimerais récupérer. Un... souvenir. Je l'ai laissé dans les quartiers de la Kabale. Je ne veux pas qu'il tombe entre les mains de quelqu'un d'autre lorsque les charognards ne manqueront pas d'envahir la tour après notre départ. Vous pourriez même y gagner quelque chose... » {n}Il laisse ces derniers mots en suspens.{/n}

languages.text: “我有个……”{n}玛拉斋顿了顿，寻找着合适的词。{/n}“……愿望。离开这座尖塔之前，我想拿件东西，某件……令人难忘的东西，我把它落在了阴谋团的住处。等我们走了之后，那些觊觎这一切的人就会涌入这座尖塔，我可不想让那件好东西落在他们手里。让我办完这件事情，说不定我也会分给你些好处……”{n}他最后的话悬在了那里。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I have a..." {n}Marazhai stops, searching for the right word.{/n} "A desire. Before we leave the spire, there is something I want to pick up. Something... memorable. I left it in the Kabal's abode. I do not want it to fall into the hands of others when carrion eaters and looters flood the spire after we are gone. There could be something in it for you..." {n}He lets the last words hang in the air.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我有个……”{n}玛拉斋顿了顿，寻找着合适的词。{/n}“……愿望。离开这座尖塔之前，我想拿件东西，某件……令人难忘的东西，我把它落在了阴谋团的住处。等我们走了之后，那些觊觎这一切的人就会涌入这座尖塔，我可不想让那件好东西落在他们手里。让我办完这件事情，说不定我也会分给你些好处……”{n}他最后的话悬在了那里。{/n}

languages.text: 「俺は…」{n}マラズハイは、言葉に迷って立ち止まった。{/n}「やりたいことがある。尖塔を去る前に、回収したい物があるんだ。俺にとって…思い出深い物でな。それを陰謀団の住みかに置いてきた。俺たちが去った後、腐肉を食べる連中や略奪者が尖塔に押し寄せた時、それが奴らの手に渡るのは避けたい。お前にとって役に立つ物でもあるかもしれん…」{n}彼は最後の言葉を濁した。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I have a..." {n}Marazhai stops, searching for the right word.{/n} "A desire. Before we leave the spire, there is something I want to pick up. Something... memorable. I left it in the Kabal's abode. I do not want it to fall into the hands of others when carrion eaters and looters flood the spire after we are gone. There could be something in it for you..." {n}He lets the last words hang in the air.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「俺は…」{n}マラズハイは、言葉に迷って立ち止まった。{/n}「やりたいことがある。尖塔を去る前に、回収したい物があるんだ。俺にとって…思い出深い物でな。それを陰謀団の住みかに置いてきた。俺たちが去った後、腐肉を食べる連中や略奪者が尖塔に押し寄せた時、それが奴らの手に渡るのは避けたい。お前にとって役に立つ物でもあるかもしれん…」{n}彼は最後の言葉を濁した。{/n}

languages.text: "Ich habe ..." {n}Marazhai hält inne und sucht das passende Wort.{/n} "Einen Wunsch. Bevor wir den Turm verlassen, möchte ich noch etwas holen. Etwas ... Erinnerungswertes. Ich habe es in den Gemächern der Kabale zurückgelassen. Ich will nicht, dass es irgendeinem Aasfresser oder Plünderer in die Hände fällt, wenn wir den Turm verlassen haben. Auch Ihr könntet einen Nutzen davon haben ..." {n}Seine Worte hängen in der Luft.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I have a..." {n}Marazhai stops, searching for the right word.{/n} "A desire. Before we leave the spire, there is something I want to pick up. Something... memorable. I left it in the Kabal's abode. I do not want it to fall into the hands of others when carrion eaters and looters flood the spire after we are gone. There could be something in it for you..." {n}He lets the last words hang in the air.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe ..." {n}Marazhai hält inne und sucht das passende Wort.{/n} "Einen Wunsch. Bevor wir den Turm verlassen, möchte ich noch etwas holen. Etwas ... Erinnerungswertes. Ich habe es in den Gemächern der Kabale zurückgelassen. Ich will nicht, dass es irgendeinem Aasfresser oder Plünderer in die Hände fällt, wenn wir den Turm verlassen haben. "Auch Ihr könntet einen Nutzen davon haben ..." {n}Seine Worte hängen in der Luft.{/n}

languages.text: «Tengo un...». {n}Marazhai hace una pausa, buscando la palabra adecuada.{/n} «Un deseo. Antes de marcharnos de la torre, hay algo que quisiera recoger. Algo... memorable. Lo dejé en las estancias de la kábala. No quiero que caiga en manos ajenas cuando los carroñeros y saqueadores invadan la torre a nuestra partida. A ti también podría beneficiarte...». {n}El Drukhari deja esta última insinuación sin concretar.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I have a..." {n}Marazhai stops, searching for the right word.{/n} "A desire. Before we leave the spire, there is something I want to pick up. Something... memorable. I left it in the Kabal's abode. I do not want it to fall into the hands of others when carrion eaters and looters flood the spire after we are gone. There could be something in it for you..." {n}He lets the last words hang in the air.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Tengo un...». {n}Marazhai hace una pausa, buscando la palabra adecuada.{/n} «Un deseo. Antes de marcharnos de la torre, hay algo que quisiera recoger. Algo... memorable. Lo dejé en las estancias de la kábala. No quiero que caiga en manos ajenas cuando los carroñeros y saqueadores invadan la torre a nuestra partida. A ti también podría beneficiarte...». {n}El Drukhari deja esta última insinuación sin concretar.{/n}

languages.text: "Benim bir..." {n}Marazhai duraksayıp doğru kelimeyi arıyor.{/n} "Arzum var. Kuleyi terk etmeden önce almak istediğim bir şey var. Hatırlanmaya değer bir şey. Onu Kabal'da bırakmıştım. Biz gittikten sonra kuleye doluşacak leş yiyicilerin ve yağmacıların eline düşmesini istemiyorum. Sana da faydası dokunabilir." {n}Cümlenin devamını getirmiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I have a..." {n}Marazhai stops, searching for the right word.{/n} "A desire. Before we leave the spire, there is something I want to pick up. Something... memorable. I left it in the Kabal's abode. I do not want it to fall into the hands of others when carrion eaters and looters flood the spire after we are gone. There could be something in it for you..." {n}He lets the last words hang in the air.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Benim bir..." {n}Marazhai duraksiyor ve doğru kelimeyi arıyor.{/n} "Arzum var. Kuleyi terk etmeden önce almak istediğim bir şey var. Hatırlanmaya değer bir şey. Onu Kabal'da bırakmıştım. Onun biz gittikten sonra kuleye doluşacak leş yiyicilerin ve yağmacıların eline düşmesini istemiyorum. Sana da faydası dokunabilir." {n}Cümlenin devamını getirmiyor.{/n}
